repeat 3 more times join color change in last stitch of r4 to white last single_crochet color change pull up loops in green and pull white through all loops r5 chain 1 turn single_crochet 20 front st 1 st r2 chain 1 turn increase 3 single_crochet in 1 st 3 sts now start increasing at each end every other row as described r3 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 3 sts r4 chain 1 turn increase 1 to adhere the two pieces start loop with existing bind off edge and work down triangle technique surface slip_stitch crochet pull up a loop through both fabric pieces and keeping loop on hook pull up another loop through fabrics and slip_stitch after bottom of heart is applied break yarn and pull up loop tail and thread onto tapestry needle
